DOC.brief_summary: CDC staff National Center Birth Defects Developmental Disabilities work closely Honduras-based organization , Project Healthy Children ( PNS ) Ministry Health , folic acid supplementation study among female maquila worker . Participants divide two group . One group receive 1.0 milligram pill daily group receive 5.0 milligram pill weekly . The aim study assess serum blood folate level measure baseline , midpoint , endpoint study . Hypothesis : Folic acid ( 5mg ) give weekly effective folic acid ( 1mg ) give daily raise blood folate level .
DOC.brief_title: Dosage Effects Folic Acid Blood Folates Honduran Women
DOC.criteria: minimum employment factory 6 mths pregnant currently consume folic acid prior birthdefect affected pregnancy chronic disease currently take folic acid antagonist
